categories: Category:Star Wars: Jedi Fallen Order - Dark Temple

nodes.text: Star Wars: Jedi Fallen Order - Dark Temple

Star Wars: Jedi Fallen Order - Dark Temple is a canon comic book miniseries published by Marvel Comics. The series, written by Matthew Rosenberg with art by Paolo Villanelli, is a prequel to the Respawn Entertainment video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order.

Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order—Dark Temple was announced on StarWars.com on June 11, 2019, as a prequel comic telling the backstory of characters from the Respawn Entertainment video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order. Author Matthew Rosenberg described it as being part of a "truly epic Star Wars story" that was being told in Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order and expressed his excitement at being able to introduce audiences to characters from the game and explore how they became the characters that gamers will meet in Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order. Artist Paolo Villanelli said that the comic will also explore new planets and villains, as well as lightsaber duels.
The comic, written in collaboration with Respawn Entertainment, began publishing in September 2019. It is published by Marvel Comics.
